title: (Fri Early Bird) Miranda Lambert Is On With Us Talking About Her Las Vegas Residency And MuttNation + Fun Fact Friday + Mailbag: Dog-In-Law Drama
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) Miranda Lambert Is On With Us Talking About Her Las Vegas Residency And MuttNation + Fun Fact Friday + Mailbag: Dog-In-Law Drama
description:
Miranda Lambert is on with us today talking about her foundation, MuttNation, and how they are helping the animals impacted by Hurricane Ian. And she talks to us about her new Las Vegas residency! Then, it's Fun Fact Friday! Hear new and exciting facts to start your weekend off right. Mailbag: We give advice to a listener who says her in-laws are always bringing their dog over to her house without asking. She loves the dog but doesn't want it over every time and is not sure how to tell them without upsetting them.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
